Articles.Content: I have just recently started playing KSP again after nearly a year long hiatus, and have found a feature I made a lot of use of missing: The ability to disable staging on separators. I'm working on a new asteroid tug which will carry rcs pods for attaching to the asteroid to increase control, but without separators i'll have to use something else to attach them to the mother craft. I just realized I could use airlocks. Still, is the ability to disable staging still in the game?
